page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Restaurants QUICKGUIDE

Introduction Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures including wines of the region. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Restaurants QUICKGUIDE Click here to return to Vence Magazine

9h00-15h00/17h00-23h00. Closed lunch Tuesday and Friday, all day Thurday. Robert and Siriya invite you to share a range of fresh prod- ucts including: scallops flambéed with Cognac; lamb from the Alps with herbs of Provence; Mediterranean fish with basil sauce; sirloin beef with cèpe mushrooms and foie gras. Every homemade ingredient is a real treat for your senses. 8 rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 32 61 52 E-Mail: teyssierleslavandes@hotmail.com Les Lavandes Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France

Hotel DianaHHH 0 Vence - Google Maps Address 79 Avenue des Poilus 06140 Vence, France https://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geo... Hôtel de charme situé à deux pas du centre historique de Vence où vous y découvrirez un art de vivre, des musées et galeries d ́art, des restaurants avec une cuisine provençale typique, un festival renommé: les nuits du sud. 79 avenue des Poilus - 06140 Vence Téléphone:+33(0)493582858•Fax0493246406 E-Mail: contact@hotel-diana.fr www.hotel-diana.fr

Restaurant, bar, brasserie and tea room at the entrance to the ancient city of Vence. Specialities: homemade paella, “moules frites”. Lunch menu from Euro12.90 including a wide variety of meats, fish, pasta, and a large selection of wine by the glass. 11-13 Place du Peyra - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 67 63 E-Mail: info@bistrodupeyra.eu www.bistrodupeyra.eu Le Bistro du Peyra 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France

11h30-15h00/18h30-22h00, closed Wednesaday’s and Thursday’s in winter. Côté Jardin Traditional cuisine, quiet garden terrace with an astonishing view of the Baous. Tajines by pre-order. 10 Avenue Henri Isnard - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 78 13 E-Mail: cotedesjardinsoirrees@yahoo.fr

Traditional restaurant, serving high quality fresh produce in a pleasant atmosphere, on a quiet terrace in the heart of the city. 15 ave Henri Isnard - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 01 27 E-Mail: contact@lafarigoule-vence.fr www.lafarigoule-vence.fr 12h00-13h30/19h30-21h30/ Tuesday closed. La Farigoule la farigoule vence A. La Farigoule 15 Avenue Henri Isnard, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 01 27 ​ 4.4 5 avis €€€ B. L'Armoise 9 Place du Peyra, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 19 29 ​ 1 avis C. HOTELS NICE 72 Ach de la Lanterne, Bat C, 06200 Nice, France ​ +33 4 92 47 88 55 ​

12h00-15h00/19h00-22h00. La Litote Contemporary cuisine served on the quiet shaded terrace of an authentic stone house in the heart of the ancient city. 5, Rue de l’Evêché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 27 82 E-Mail: lalitotevence@gmail.com www.lalitote.com

12h00-14h30/19h00-22h00/ Closed on Tuesday and Wednesdays/ Open all days in July and August. Our small restaurant is situated on the town hall square, in the quiet pedestrian area of the Historic City. We serve Italo-Provençal cuisine prepared with fresh seasonal products. New menu monthly. Speciality: lobster. Reservation obligatory 10bis, place Clémenceau - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 84 15 La Cassolette Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France

07h00-00h30. La Régence Café La Regence café welcomes you to the refined decor of our mezzanine lounge bar, ideal for candle-lit dinners, parties, family dinners, seminars, banquets. Open every day, serving top quality traditional cuisine. 10 place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 02 10 E-Mail: laregencecafe@hotmail.fr Adresse 9 Place Clemenceau 06140 Vence, France

12h00-14h00/18h00-22h030 except Monday evening and Wednesday lunch. Traditional homemade Vietnamese cuisine. Take away possible. Parking available 30 metres away. 14 Avenue Henri Isnard - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 99 84 Le Vietnam Le Vietnam, à proximité de Avenue Henri Isnard, 06140 Vence, France A. Le Vietnam 14 Avenue Henri Isnard, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 99 84 ​ 1 avis

le table de domi vence mi 0 Vence, France ​ 12h00-14h30/19h00-22h00, except Monday and Sunday evening. La Table de Domi We have two different styled cosy dining areas. The first level offers contemporary decor, while the second level is an original stone vaulted room. A large selection of tradi- tional dishes prepared with fresh produce, in a pleasant and friendly ambience. 7, Place Surian - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 27 64 E-Mail: dominiquecheval2002@yahoo.fr

11h00-15h00/19h00-23h00, closed Tuesday and Wednesday. La Taverne Saint-Veran la taverne saint veran vence A. Taverne St Véran 2 Place Surian, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 24 00 98 ​ Founded in 1980 in the historic city of Vence, our small family restaurant welcomes you with its warm and friendly ambiance. Our specialities: traditional cuisine, wood-fire cooked pizzas. 2, Place Surian - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 00 98

12h00-14h00/19h30-22h00. Closed Monday and Sunday. Les Templiers Restaurant Les Templiers, à proximité de Avenue du Maréchal Joffre, Vence, France mpliers l Joffre, 06140 Vence, s Situated at the start of the road leading to the Col de Vence, we offer a relaxing atmosphere in which to discover new flavours. Our unique recipes are prepared with fresh local produce. 39 Avenue du Maréchal Joffre - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 06 05 E-Mail: templiers.vence@orange.fr www.restaurant-vence.com

Wood fire cuisine. Starter; meat or fish; homemade desert. All our main courses are served with five side dishes. 28 Avenue General LeClerc - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 59 7950 E-Mail: didier.simon@wanadoo.fr 19h00-23h00 except Thursdays. Le Vagabond Le Vagabond, à proximité de Avenue Général Leclerc, 06140 Vence, France A. Le Vagabond 28 Avenue Général Leclerc, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 59 79 50 ​

18h45-22h00/ Saturday and Sunday also 12h00-14h00. Le Passe Muraille Adresse 1 Rue du Peyra 06140 Vence, France Gourmet cuisine served in our 13th century cellar. Weekend concert dinners from 8pm: Euro28 - jazz, blues, latino, classical. Other menus: Euro24 to Euro32. 2 rue de Peyra - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 10 21 E-Mail: le.passemuraille@orange.fr www.lepassemuraille.com

Explore our menu of flavours at pocket-friendly prices. Watch our chef prepare your meal, while you relax on the terrace surrounded by trees. Or enjoy a drink in our lounge bar while watching our huge screen. Parties and events by arrangement. 25 place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 54 88 12 70 Email: info@onlyvous.com www.onlyvous.com Only Vous Adresse 25 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France 9h30-00h30.
Chez Romano Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France 41 Avenue Marcellin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 24 61 50

Terrace restaurant, recommended by the “Guide du Rou- tard”, serving traditional cuisine, speciality bruschetta. Open 12 noon to 2.30pm for lunch, and 7pm to 10.30pm for dinner. Parking 2 minutes away in the Place du Grand Jardin. 13 place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 64 31 09h00-00h00/Sunday closed. Le Troquet Adresse 13 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France

12h00-14h30/19h00-23h00, Tuesday and Sunday closed. L’Ecrin Adresse 8 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France Come and taste genuine Breton crêpes (sweet or savoury) in our authentic yet modern, friendly restaurant. Also enjoy our large selection of teas and hot chocolate throughout the day. 8 avenue Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 81 19 97 27 E-Mail: contact@creperielecrin.com www.creperielecrin.com

Adresse 20 Rue de Stamford 06140 Vence, France Our new restaurant is an invitation to discover the high quality flavours of Northern and Southern India: Madras curry; chicken Saag Malai; chicken Tandoori; Pondichery beef..... Daily special: Euro10 20 rue Stamford - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 51 54 28 75 E-Mail: ganeshantibes@yahoo.fr 12h00-14h30/19h00-23h00. Le Chennai

0830h00-19h00. Open after 19h00 on reservation. Square Café Adresse 9 Place Clemenceau 06140 Vence, France Pancakes and salads served from 8h30 to 19h00. Daily special at Euro10. Open after 19h00 only on reservation. Quiet terrace. Drinks and Malongo coffee. 44 Avenue Colonel Meyère - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 67 58

Restarant, bar, brasserie and café at the Place du Grand Jardin. 4 Place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 24 21 15 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. La Victoire Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France

7h30-22h00/ Sundays 07h30-15h00. Closed Monday. La Brasserie des Arts Adresse 7 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France French bar and brasserie. Two restaurant rooms; a cosy relaxing lounge for a nice cup of coffee or aperitif; and a quiet garden terrace surrounded by flowers. 7, Avenue Marcellin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 59 35 74

In the heart of the Historic City, Philippe offers you a selection of sandwiches, salads prepared with market-fresh produce, ice-creams, smoothies, milk shakes, homemade pastries in a traditional charming and friendly setting. 3bis rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 81 91 98 31 E-Mail: philmarc64@aol.com 7h00-19h00/open Monday in summer. La Merenda Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France

12h00-13h30/19h30-21h30/ Sunday closed. Auberge des Seigneurs A. AubergedesSeigneurs 1 Rue du Docteur Binet, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 04 24 ​ 1 avis B. L'aubergeDesSeigneurs Place du Frêne., Vence, 06140, 06140, France ​ +33 4 93 58 04 24 ​ Auberge des Seigneurs, à proximité de Rue du Docteur Binet, 06140 Vence, France The oldest inn in Vence offers 6 confortable bedrooms named after famous painters. The restaurant is a must with its inventive cooking from fresh local products. The dining room is unique with meat cooked in the fireplace. 1 rue Docteur Binet - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 04 24 E-Mail: www.auberge-seigneurs.com

Eruptatios aciistrum corepercium doluptas est eossi omnis dis et velit, invelestore modit, nistium et quid ex et, conet laboratur? Quia pliquam ut quid milibuscia net dus 37 Avenue Alphonse Toreille - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 78 58 Le Vieux Couvent 12h00-14h00/18h30-22h00. Adresse 37 Avenue Alphonse Toreille 06140 Vence, France

Hôtel de ville, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/17/13 7:03 AM 11h30- 14h30 / 18h00- 22h300 Les Saveurs d’Asie Adresse 1 Rue de l'Hôtel de ville 1 Rue de l'Hôtel de ville 06140 Vence, France ps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=fr&geocode=&q...n=0.012049,0.013754&t=m&z=16&ei=MuI3UrOTHJCPigaovIG4Cw&pw=2 Page 1 of 1 Les Saveurs d’Asie offer a large variety of delicious Vietnamese, Thai, and Chinese specialities. Tran and Kieu welcome you with a smile and will advise you if needed. 1, rue de l’Hôtel de Ville - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 24 66 57

Le Boudoir Gourmand A lovely and cosy place dedicated to good food and real service, “à la carte” for everybody with taste. 3, place Vielle - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 32 90 97 E-Mail: bourgeois3@gmail.com www.facebook.com/leboudoirgourmandvence 11h00-23h00. Wednesday closed. Adresse 1 Rue du Peyra 06140 Vence, France
12h00-14h00/18h30-22h00. Les Agapes 4 Place Clémenceau - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 50 23 64 E-Mail: pascalsergent@yahoo.fr Adresse 9 Place Clemenceau 06140 Vence, France

Indian specialities - Tandoori and Curry. Lunch daily special at Euro10, including glass of wine or cup of coffee. Dinner menu from Euro15. 10% discount for take aways. Free home delivery. 1 place Antony Mars - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 59 16 24 E-Mail: harinie@orange.fr 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Le Rajasthan Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France

9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. La Pergola la pergola 2 Avenue de la Résistance, 06140 Vence, rance ​ 33 4 93 58 02 34 ​ 2 avis a Pergola The Brasserie “La Pergola” offers you traditional cuisine, quick and efficient service in its 130 seat restaurant, 50 of which are on the sunny roof-top terrace. 32, avenue de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 02 34 E-Mail: snclapergola@yahoo.fr

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
